Entries.summer_Fri: I kind of wish I had a cat. For a while, I wasn't able to because my Dad was allergic, but... I guess that's not a problem anymore.$s

Entries.fall_Tue4: I may fight with my Mom a lot, but I know she's just looking out for me. She's doing what she thinks is best.$s#$b#I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone.$8
Entries.Tue2: ...*sigh*...$s#$e#I know my Mom means well, but sometimes she just cannot understand my point of view. Wasn't she ever young?
Entries.Thu: #$1 Abigail1#Mom's making dinner tonight... it's better than Dad's was, at least.$s#$e#I don't feel like doing anything today...$u

Entries.fall_Tue4: I may fight with my Dad a lot, but I know he's just looking out for me. He's doing what she thinks is best.$s#$b#I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone.$8
Entries.Tue2: ...*sigh*...$s#$e#I know my Dad means well, but sometimes he just cannot understand my point of view. Wasn't he ever young?
Entries.Thu: #$1 Abigail1#Dad's making dinner tonight... I wish Mom was still alive, so I wouldn't have to eat it.$s#$e#I don't feel like doing anything today...$u

Entries.fall_Tue4: I used to fight with my parents a lot... I regret not apologizing to them sooner.$s#$b#I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone.$8
Entries.Tue2: ...*sigh*...$s#$e#Sorry. I'm just... thinking about my parents. I'm going through a lot right now, and usually they'd be here for me, but... not anymore.$s
Entries.Thu: #$1 Abigail1#I have to make myself dinner every night... it always ends up awful.$s#$e#I don't feel like doing anything today...$u

Entries.give_pendant: !!$7#$b#...$2#$b#I never thought I would go this far with anyone...$2#$b#@... I would be happy and proud to be your wife.$4#$b#I guess I better go tell {{LewisSubF}}.$1#$b#I know you're busy so I'll handle the wedding, should take three days or so.$1

Entries.spring_4.002: How much longer do you need, Mag? I'm hungry.$s

Entries.marriage_Fri.000: Hey, @? I'm just reminiscing, thinking about my mom.

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Things seem to be okay without me around.

Entries.Neutral_6: I wonder how the old shop is doing? I should probably go visit sometime.
